abstract: A kindergartner may not understand that her pirate outfit is "hot" - but that doesn't mean it's harmless.
snippet: A kindergartner may not understand that her pirate outfit is "hot" - but that doesn't mean it's harmless.
lead_paragraph: Is it Halloween already? I love this holiday: the jack o' lanterns. The Snickers bars. The small girls coming to my door dressed as prostitutes!

headline.main: Sexy Costumes for Little Girls Aren't Cute
